Prince Abyssinia Akweke Nwafor Orizu (17 Julaị 1914 – 1999)
bụ onye Naijiria sitere n'alaIgbo na onye isi oche Sineti nke abụọ nke Naijiria site na 16 Nọvemba 1960 ruo 15 Jenụarị 1966, n'oge Republic mbụ nke Naijiria
Orizu bukwara onye isi ala Naijiria site na ngwụcha 1965 rue mgbe ndi agha weghaara ọchịchị n'ike n'ọnwa Jenuarị 1966
Ọ bụ onye ezinaụlọ eze Nnewi
Nwa nwanne ya bụ Igwe Kenneth Onyeneke Orizu III bụ Igwe (Eze) nke alaeze Nnewi ugbu a
A gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ Nwafor Orizu College of Education dị na Nsugbe, Anambra State, n'aha ya
A mụrụ Orizu na 1914 n'ụlọ eze nke Nnewi, n'Anambra Steeti, na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria, ọ bu nwa Eze Ugbonyamba, Igwe Orizu I
Orizu gara mba United States na 1939, ma nweta akara ugo mmụta na gọọmenti site na Mahadum steeti Ohio nakwa nzere M.A
na Mahadum Columbia

Ọ bụ onye na-akwado nke usoro sara mbara nke mmụta America, ma na emegide kwa usoro ndị Briten dị warawara, nke a nyere ya aha otutu "Orizontal", bu aha e ji ama ya njakiri nakwa n'ihi mkparịta ụka ọ na enwe kwa mgbe n'isiokwu ahu
Dị ka a tụlere n'akwụkwọ 1944 ya, enweghị obi ilu, ọ bụ onye na-akwadosi ike iwebata usoro America na Naijiria
O guzobere ọgbako American Council on African Education (ACAE), nke nwetara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nkuzi sitere na isi mmalite America maka abamuru nke ụmụ akwụkwọ Africa
N'ihe dị ka afọ 1949, Orizu zụtara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Enitona na igwe obibi akwụkwọ Enitona n'aka onye nkwado, naanị £500 nke ọ gbaziri ka ọ jị zụo ya
Onye nkwado ọzọ resiri ya ụgbọ ala okomoko wee si ya kwutaba ụgwọ obere obere
O hibere akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-akpọ The West Africa Examiner wee bụrụ onye isi nchịkwa, ebe M.C.K
Ajuluchukwu bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Orizu gara Enugwu ịkasi ndị na-egwuputa ihe n'ala ka agbagbuchara mmadu iri abụọ na otu bu ndị ọrụ na-egwuputa mmanụ n'ala na 18 Novemba 1949
Ma eleghị anya, n'ihi okwu iwe ọkụ o kwuru n'ebe ahụ, ndị ọchịchị Briten mara ya ikpe ịga mkpọrọ afọ asaa maka ebubo na o mefuru ego nke ACAE n'ụzọ na-ezighị ezi
Mana ka emechara, Roy Wilkins, onye isi oche ACAE na US, degara Nnamdi Azikiwe ("Zik") akwụkwọ ozi gọpụrụ Dr Nwafor Orizu site n'ebubo ụgha ahụ ebokwasiri ya
Na Septemba 1953, otu onye ọka ikpe Naijiria mara Orizu ikpe maka ebubo ụgha asaa nke wayo na izu ohi nke ego ezubere maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ akwụkwọ na mahadum America
E mesịa, a tụrụ ya mkpọrọ afọ asaa.
Orizu zọrọ ọkwa nke ọma maka ntuliaka dịka onye nọọrọ onwe ya ịnọchite anya mpaghara Ọnicha, wee bụrụ onye isi ụtarị n'ụlọomeiwu ọwụwa anyanwụ
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ sonyeere ndị ọzọ nwere onwe ha ka ha guzobe otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Council of Nigeria and Cameroon (NCNC)
Ọ rụrụ nnukwu ọrụ n'inyere Zik aka ka ọ bụrụ onye isi na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ, jiri mmetụta ya na NCNC mee ka Prọfesọ Eyo Ita gbaa arụkwaghịm dị ka onye isi ala mpaghara
Zik họpụtara Orizu ka ọ bụrụ onye minista ọchịchị obodo
Mgbe Naijiria nwetara nnwere onwe na 1 October 1960, Orizu ghọrọ onye isi oche nke Senate Nigeria
Onye isi ala Naijiria, Nnamdi Azikiwe hapụrụ obodo ahụ na ngwụcha 1965 nke mbụ gawa Yurop, wee banye ụgbọ mmiri gaa Caribbean
N'okpuru iwu, Orizu ghọrọ onye isi oche mgbe ọ na-anọghị ma nwee ikike niile nke Onye isi ala.
Otu ndị ọrụ agha na-eto eto n'enweghị mmasị n'ọchịchị nke oge ahụ, nke Major Chukwuma Kaduna Nzeogwu bu onye ndu ha weere ọchịchị n'ike n'ụbọchị 16 Jenụwarị 1966

Ndị agha ahụ kwụsịrị nnupụisi ahụ ngwa ngwa ma weghaara ọchịchị mgbe o doro anya na e kpochapụrụ ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ndi gụnyere Prime Minister Abubakar Tafawa Balewa, Premier nke Northern Region Sir Ahmadu Bello na Premier nke Western Region, Chief Samuel Ladoke Akintola
Orizu mere mgbasa ozi na mba niile, ka ọ kọchara Dọkịta Nnamdi Azikiwe n'ekwentị maka mkpebi ndị otu ụlọomeiwu mere, ma kwupụta mkpebi "afọ ofufo" nke ndị ụlọ ọrụ maka ịnyefe ikike n'aka ndị agha
Major General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi meziri mgbasa ozi nke ya, nabata "okuku"
Na 17 Jenuarị, Major General Ironsi hiwere kansul ndị agha na Legọs wee kwụsịtụ iwu nke ala
a
Mgbe ọchịchị ahụ gasịrị, Orizu kwụsịrị na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mana ọ nọgidere na-arụsi ọrụ ike na agụmakwụkwọ
Tupu agha obodo, o hiwere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị aha ya bu Nigerian Secondary School, na Nnewi
Ọ bụ onye nwe ya ruo mgbe gọọmentị steeti weghaara ụlọ akwụkwọ niile ka e meriri Biafra
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu dị ka onye nkuzi ma na-ebipụta ọtụtụ akwụkwọ
Ọzọkwa, n'agbata afọ 1974 na 1975, gọọmentị East Central steeti dara ada, nke Dọkịta Ukpabi Asika duziri, wee họpụta ya dika onye isi oche nke ngalaba ndị nkuzi na steeti ahụ n'Enugwu.
